specification.preconditions: - The array a must be nonempty and x must be less than the length of the array.
specification.postconditions:
- p is an index with x ≤ p < a.size
- For every index i with i < x, a[i]! ≤ m
- There exists an index i with i < x such that a[i]! = m
- If p < a.size - 1 then for every index i with i < p, a[i]! < a[p]!
- If for every index i with x ≤ i < a.size, a[i]! ≤ m, then p = a.size - 1
